name: Sharon Jones
description: '''Sharon Lafaye Jones''' (May 4, 1956 â€“ November 18, 2016) was an American [[soul music|soul]] and [[funk]] singer. She was the lead singer of [[Sharon Jones & The Dap-Kings]], a soul and funk band based in [[Brooklyn]], New York. Jones experienced breakthrough success relatively late in life, releasing her first record when she was 40 years old. In 2014, Jones was nominated for her first [[Grammy]], in the category [[Best R&B Album]], for ''[[Give the People What They Want (Sharon Jones & the Dap-Kings album)|Give the People What They Want]].''
